AddPermission.name: AddPermission
AddPermission.description:
Grants permission to add a statement to a topic's access control policy, granting
                                                access for the specified AWS accounts to the specified actions

CheckIfPhoneNumberIsOptedOut.name: CheckIfPhoneNumberIsOptedOut
CheckIfPhoneNumberIsOptedOut.description:
Grants permission to accept a phone number and indicate whether the phone holder has
                                                opted out of receiving SMS messages from your account

ConfirmSubscription.name: ConfirmSubscription
ConfirmSubscription.description:
Grants permission to verify an endpoint owner's intent to receive messages by validating
                                                the token sent to the endpoint by an earlier Subscribe action

CreatePlatformApplication.name: CreatePlatformApplication
CreatePlatformApplication.description:
Grants permission to create a platform application object for one of the supported
                                                push notification services, such as APNS and GCM, to which devices and mobile apps
                                                may register

CreatePlatformEndpoint.name: CreatePlatformEndpoint
CreatePlatformEndpoint.description:
Grants permission to create an endpoint for a device and mobile app on one of the
                                                supported push notification services, such as GCM and APNS

CreateSMSSandboxPhoneNumber.name: CreateSMSSandboxPhoneNumber
CreateSMSSandboxPhoneNumber.description:
Grants permission to add a destination phone number and send a one-time password (OTP)
                                                to that phone number for an AWS account

CreateTopic.name: CreateTopic
CreateTopic.description: Grants permission to create a topic to which notifications can be published

DeleteEndpoint.name: DeleteEndpoint
DeleteEndpoint.description: Grants permission to delete the endpoint for a device and mobile app from Amazon SNS

DeletePlatformApplication.name: DeletePlatformApplication
DeletePlatformApplication.description:
Grants permission to delete a platform application object for one of the supported
                                                push notification services, such as APNS and GCM

DeleteSMSSandboxPhoneNumber.name: DeleteSMSSandboxPhoneNumber
DeleteSMSSandboxPhoneNumber.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS account's verified or pending phone number

DeleteTopic.name: DeleteTopic
DeleteTopic.description: Grants permission to delete a topic and all its subscriptions

GetEndpointAttributes.name: GetEndpointAttributes
GetEndpointAttributes.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the endpoint attributes for a device on one of the supported
                                                push notification services, such as GCM and APNS

GetPlatformApplicationAttributes.name: GetPlatformApplicationAttributes
GetPlatformApplicationAttributes.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the attributes of the platform application object for
                                                the supported push notification services, such as APNS and GCM

GetSMSAttributes.name: GetSMSAttributes
GetSMSAttributes.description: Grants permission to return the settings for sending SMS messages from your account

GetSMSSandboxAccountStatus.name: GetSMSSandboxAccountStatus
GetSMSSandboxAccountStatus.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the sandbox status for the calling account in the target
                                                region

GetSubscriptionAttributes.name: GetSubscriptionAttributes
GetSubscriptionAttributes.description: Grants permission to return all of the properties of a subscription

GetTopicAttributes.name: GetTopicAttributes
GetTopicAttributes.description: Grants permission to return all of the properties of a topic

ListEndpointsByPlatformApplication.name: ListEndpointsByPlatformApplication
ListEndpointsByPlatformApplication.description:
Grants permission to list the endpoints and endpoint attributes for devices in a supported
                                                push notification service, such as GCM and APNS

ListOriginationNumbers.name: ListOriginationNumbers
ListOriginationNumbers.description: Grants permission to list all origination numbers, and their metadata

ListPhoneNumbersOptedOut.name: ListPhoneNumbersOptedOut
ListPhoneNumbersOptedOut.description:
Grants permission to return a list of phone numbers that are opted out, meaning you
                                                cannot send SMS messages to them

ListPlatformApplications.name: ListPlatformApplications
ListPlatformApplications.description:
Grants permission to list the platform application objects for the supported push
                                                notification services, such as APNS and GCM

ListSMSSandboxPhoneNumbers.name: ListSMSSandboxPhoneNumbers
ListSMSSandboxPhoneNumbers.description:
Grants permission to list the calling account's current pending and verified destination
                                                phone numbers

ListSubscriptions.name: ListSubscriptions
ListSubscriptions.description: Grants permission to return a list of the requester's subscriptions

ListSubscriptionsByTopic.name: ListSubscriptionsByTopic
ListSubscriptionsByTopic.description: Grants permission to return a list of the subscriptions to a specific topic

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list all tags added to the specified Amazon SNS topic

ListTopics.name: ListTopics
ListTopics.description: Grants permission to return a list of the requester's topics

OptInPhoneNumber.name: OptInPhoneNumber
OptInPhoneNumber.description:
Grants permission to opt in a phone number that is currently opted out, which enables
                                                you to resume sending SMS messages to the number

Publish.name: Publish
Publish.description: Grants permission to send a message to all of a topic's subscribed endpoints

RemovePermission.name: RemovePermission
RemovePermission.description: Grants permission to remove a statement from a topic's access control policy

SetEndpointAttributes.name: SetEndpointAttributes
SetEndpointAttributes.description:
Grants permission to set the attributes for an endpoint for a device on one of the
                                                supported push notification services, such as GCM and APNS

SetPlatformApplicationAttributes.name: SetPlatformApplicationAttributes
SetPlatformApplicationAttributes.description:
Grants permission to set the attributes of the platform application object for the
                                                supported push notification services, such as APNS and GCM

SetSMSAttributes.name: SetSMSAttributes
SetSMSAttributes.description:
Grants permission to set the default settings for sending SMS messages and receiving
                                                daily SMS usage reports

SetSubscriptionAttributes.name: SetSubscriptionAttributes
SetSubscriptionAttributes.description:
Grants permission to allow a subscription owner to set an attribute of the topic to
                                                a new value

SetTopicAttributes.name: SetTopicAttributes
SetTopicAttributes.description:
Grants permission to allow a topic owner to set an attribute of the topic to a new
                                                value

Subscribe.name: Subscribe
Subscribe.description:
Grants permission to prepare to subscribe an endpoint by sending the endpoint a confirmation
                                                message

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to the specified Amazon SNS topic

Unsubscribe.name: Unsubscribe
Unsubscribe.description: Grants permission to delete a subscription

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified Amazon SNS topic

VerifySMSSandboxPhoneNumber.name: VerifySMSSandboxPhoneNumber
VerifySMSSandboxPhoneNumber.description:
Grants permission to verify a destination phone number with a one-time password (OTP)
                                                for an AWS account
